de.tum.bgu.lfk.puicomponents.slider

Class PSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.bgu.lfk.puicomponents.slider.PSlider

  • public class PSlider
extends java.lang.Object
    a simple slider for using with processing. the class belongs to the custom ui controls.
    Since:
    19.02.2015
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Mathias Jahnke, Technische Universität München, Chair of Cartography
